Home.introduction: I am a final year Information Technology (B.Eng.) student from South-Eastern Finland University of Applied Sciences, specializing in Full Stack development, machine learning, and modern technologies (especially Cisco).
Home.transcript: If you would like to to view my current academic transcript, please contact me directly.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I have experience with:

Projects.description: More projects will be updated in this page soon. Feel free to check out my GitHub profile in the meantime.
Projects.weatherStationDesc: This project involved developing a scalable weather station using an ESP32 microcontroller for real-time data collection. It includes a Go-based API, an MQTT broker, and InfluxDB-Grafana for data storage and visualization. The system is automated with a single startup script for easy deployment.
Projects.faceMaskDetectorDesc: This project involved preprocessing image dataset from Kaggle, converting annotations into YOLO format, and filtering images for single-person detections. YOLOv11 was used for real-time detection of face masks, and a custom Connvolutional Neural Network (CNN) and RetinaNet were trained to classify masked and unmasked faces.
Projects.taskManagerDesc: This project involved creating a web application using React for the frontend, styled with Bootstrap, and backend built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL for the database. The project also involved creating a RESTful API for CRUD operations.
Projects.fitnessTracker: Fitness Tracker Application with Tkinter Python
Projects.fitnessTrackerDesc: This project involved creating a fitness tracker application using Tkinter in Python. The application allows users to track their workouts, calculate calories burned and bmi, and set a meal plan. The aim was to get acquainted with GUI programming in Python.
Projects.mobileApp: Simple mobile app projects using Java on Android Studio
Projects.mobileAppDesc: These projects involved creating simple mobile applications using Java on Android Studio. The applications include a simple calculator with intent operations, image viewer, and a media player. The aim was to get acquainted with android development and Java programming.
Projects.gitlabCICD: The demonstration of GitLab CI/CD and Azure with container images
Projects.gitlabCICDDesc: This video demonstrates how to set up a GitLab CI/CD pipeline to build and push a container image to the Azure Container Registry.
